title: ウインバリアシオン登場！

text_block_list.text: With every leap he takes, sighs of admiration escape from the audience seats.
A dazzling expressiveness and solid technique. The audience is captivated by the brilliance of that single individual. That figure is precisely——

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Truly, the main character...!
The day the challenge to the Twinkle Series with Win Variation began.
At her request, we were watching a DVD of a performance by her father, a famous ballet dancer.
An intensity far beyond imagination, and a dazzling brilliance that blinds the eyes. That radiance doesn't easily fade from my mind——
choice_data_list: (So this is the main character she's aiming for...!)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Sorry for this on such an important day. I wanted you to see the main character I'm aiming for before today begins again.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Beautiful, the most radiant existence. That is the main character... my dad.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: ...I want to become the main character in the world of racing.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Amidst the unending applause and cheers, like someone continuously bathed in the spotlight... the most beautiful, radiant existence.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: To do that, I have to win. Because the main character in racing is the winner.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: So, I want to do my best. I'm still lacking in many ways, but if I keep trying, someday my dream will come true!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Because any wall can be overcome...!
choice_data_list: Yeah, let's do our best together!
Yeah, let's do our best together!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Hehe, yes!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: ...Somehow, I feel like I can win now. I feel like I could easily overtake that guy's back!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Alright, it's a bit early, but I'll head out first. Gotta warm up properly!
Yes, today, in preparation for the upcoming Twinkle Series——
To get a bit of momentum, we had planned to participate in a mock race.
(Rustling...)
Heading to the grounds... for some reason, a considerable number of reporters seemed to be waiting eagerly for the race to start.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
For a debutante's simulated race...
This is...? Huh, usually——
choice_data_list: Yeah, you don't see this often up to here.
Yeah, you don't see this often up to here.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I see...
Then, this must be——

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Orfevre's here!
Wow, she really has an aura...!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
I'd heard rumors, but this is beyond imagination.
Hard to believe she hasn't even debuted yet.

Just by being here, she captures all eyes.
An Umamusume radiating a breathtakingly dazzling aura——
Orfevre.

She's also the one Win Variation wants to defeat
more than anything.

And so, the simulated race began,
with even a somewhat hostile atmosphere felt——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!
It was truly Orfevre's solo show.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Now the final corner, Orfevre moves from the outside——
She takes the lead! Orfevre in front! Orfevre in front!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
(...Ah, this pressure again...!
It's crackling, glaring, hot, painful...!)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hahh, hahh, hahh!
...Ahhhhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Win Variation from behind!
But Orfevre,
extends her lead by 2 lengths, 3 lengths!

She surges to the front in the final stretch,
breaking away from the pack in a solo run.
She tears across the turf with a hot wind——

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (Damn it, wait, wait... I said wait...!)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (...!! Dammmnn it!!)

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: ——Orfevre, a dominant finish!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah... hah...!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (~~~! I couldn't even step on her shadow...! Damn it, what was I thinking, that I could win!?)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Damn, damn...!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: --O, Orfevre...!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: ...Eh, ah... wha, wha...!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ignoring me!?

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Orfevre-san! Look over here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Could we have a quick interview over here!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ignoring me, huh.
............Someone like me.
After the mock race, Win Variation left the grounds with few words.
Despite showing a promising run with a fantastic start dash and a powerful stretch in the final straight—
Her figure, leaving as if fleeing, caught my attention, and when I followed... she was standing alone on an empty hill.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huff...!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Orfevre's...!! You idiot, aaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Don't ignore meeeeeee!
Look at me for a second, you damn show-off!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Everything... you took everything!
Victories, the reporters, everything, everything...!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
You were the only one watching me!
Dammiiiiiiit!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Pisses me off...! Pisses me off, pisses me off!
Damn it, -- someday, someday, someday, I swear!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I'll drag you down from the throne
and make you falllllllllll!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa...

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, T-Trainer!?
N-no, when did you...!
I confessed that I was worried about her after the mock race and had followed her.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... So that's what happened.
I'm sorry for making you worry too.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Actually... um, I sometimes come here like this.
O-of course, only when no one's around!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
...It really helps me feel refreshed.
It clears my head and makes me want to keep trying.

Back when I first met her,
she was suppressing dark feelings like jealousy and envy toward Orfevre.

I told her to turn it into strength instead of suppressing it.
It seems that message has successfully become her power--

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
The main character is!!
...Meeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!
She has splendidly mastered the art of sublimating those pitch-black feelings.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: ...Things like being pissed off or frustrated.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I still get confused sometimes.
Wondering if it's okay to have feelings like this.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
But I've stopped hiding them.
Because I've learned these feelings can be a springboard.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I want to surpass him. When I think that,
I feel like I can do anything...!

Win Variation is serious.
She trains diligently,
and is cautious with others as well——

She even confronts each and every one of her emotions
far too properly.

That's precisely why she sometimes pushes herself so hard
that it feels dangerous.
choice_data_list: (As her trainer, I must support her properly)

text_block_list.text:
First, what I can do is——take a step forward.
Facing the cityscape spreading out below,
I took a deep breath.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: T-T-T-Trainer-san!?
choice_data_list: You will definitely become the main character!!
You will definitely become the main character!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
choice_data_list: So let's do our best together!!
So let's do our best together!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah………….
Wh……what are you doing?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
That, so suddenly——I was surprised.
Hehe…….

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, ahahaha……!
Hehehehe. Sorry, I hit my funny bone……!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa……hehe.
……That's right. Let's do our best, together……!

And so, the days of racing through the Twinkle Series
with Win Variation began.
